Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-40635 affecting package moby-containerd-cc for versions less than 1.7.7-11
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-40635 affecting package moby-containerd-cc for versions less than 1.7.7-11. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-containerd-cc is earlier than 1.7.7-11, affected by CVE-2024-40635
